Introduction

Gongchan is a South Korean singer and actor, best known as the youngest member of the boy group B1A4. He was introduced as the third member of B1A4 by WM Entertainment on April 11, 2011. The group made their official debut on April 23, 2011, with the release of their first mini album Let's Fly.

In August 2024, WM Entertainment announced that Gongchan had decided not to renew his contract with the agency. Despite his departure, Gongchan will continue to participate in B1A4's future group activities.
